content:
I believe that following issue FHIR-12460 it should be possible to say:

  • twice a day on Mondays
  • 10:00 AM every other day

However looking at the text for dayOfWeek in the current build, this still explicitly states:

The elements frequency and period cannot be used as well as dayOfWeek.

I believe this sentence should be removed?

As does the text for timeOfDay:

The elements when, frequency and period cannot be used as well as timeOfDay.

I believe this should be: "The element when cannot be used as well as timeOfDay."
@Arianne van de Wetering Can you submit a change request?

Arianne van de Wetering Can you submit a change request?

FHIR-25289

@Lloyd McKenzie , @Grahame Grieve , I am puzzled, because the issue FHIR-25289 claims that the wording should be changed as per the suggestion in the issue and the issue has status resolved. However looking at http://build.fhir.org/datatypes-definitions.html#Timing.repeat.dayOfWeek and http://build.fhir.org/datatypes-definitions.html#Timing.repeat.timeOfDay the text has not changed at all?
it's approved but the change hasn't actually been made yet (status = change required)
Oh apologies, the workflow was not clear to me. Thanks for the reassurance
